name: squared
description: Virtual DOM and CSS framework for parsing usable browser data.

scripts.bundles: node bundle.js -f base -o ./dist/bundles/squared.base.bundle.js && node bundle.js -f base -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.base.bundle.js && node bundle.js -f android -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android.bundle.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android.bundle.js &&node bundle.js -f chrome -o ./dist/bundles/squared.chrome.bundle.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.chrome.bundle.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -o ./dist/bundles/squared.vdom.bundle.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.vdom.bundle.js && node bundle.js -f vdom-lite -o ./dist/bundles/squared.vdom-lite.bundle.js
scripts.md5-check: npm run md5-chromium && npm run md5-chromium-diff
scripts.md5-chromium: rimraf temp/chromium/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium -f 1
scripts.md5-chromium-raw: rimraf temp/chromium-raw/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium-raw -f 2 -t 300
scripts.md5-chromium-svg: rimraf temp/chromium-svg/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium-svg -f 4
scripts.md5-chromium-wc: rimraf temp/chromium-wc/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium-wc -f 16
scripts.md5-chromium-unstable: rimraf temp/chromium-unstable/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium-unstable -f 32
scripts.md5-chromium-all: npm run md5-chromium && npm run md5-chromium-raw && npm run md5-chromium-svg && npm run md5-chromium-wc && npm run md5-chromium-unstable
scripts.md5-chromium-all-diff: npm run md5-chromium-all && npm run md5-chromium-diff && npm run md5-chromium-raw-diff && npm run md5-chromium-svg-diff && npm run md5-chromium-wc-diff && npm run md5-chromium-unstable-diff
scripts.md5-chromium-all-rebase: npm run md5-chromium-rebase && npm run md5-chromium-raw-rebase && npm run md5-chromium-svg-rebase && npm run md5-chromium-wc-rebase && npm run md5-chromium-unstable-rebase
scripts.dev-android: npm run dev-base && npm run dev-android-framework
scripts.dev-chrome: npm run dev-base && npm run dev-chrome-framework
scripts.dev-vdom: npm run dev-base && npm run dev-vdom-framework
scripts.dev-vdom-lite: npm run dev-base && npm run dev-vdom-lite-framework
scripts.prod-all: npm run clean && eslint **/*.ts && npm run prod && npm run prod-android && npm run prod-chrome && npm run prod-vdom && npm run prod-vdom-lite && npm run prod-express && npm run bundles
scripts.install-chrome: npm i @babel/core && npm i @babel/preset-env && npm i rollup && npm i terser && npm i uglify-js && npm i prettier && npm i clean-css && npm i html-minifier-terser && npm i html-minifier
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* && rimraf dist/* && rimraf temp/*

author: An Pham <anpham6@gmail.com>
